description:
50 years have passed since http://anidb.net/ch1742 [Joseph Joestar] defeated http://anidb.net/ch51463 [Cars], and he has now arrived in Japan, together with http://anidb.net/ch1722 [Mohammed Avdol], to meet with his grandson, http://anidb.net/ch894 [Kuujou Joutarou]. Because of him beating up a couple of thugs, Joutarou is now in prison and refuses to leave, since he claims that he is possessed by an "http://anidb.net/ch1720 [evil spirit]."
During his meeting with Joutarou, Joseph tells him that the so-called "evil spirit" that has possessed him is what is known as a Stand, which is the manifistation of one`s own life energy and psyche, and can only be seen by other Stand users, something both Joseph and Avdol are.
The reason for the appearance of both Joseph and Joutarou`s Stands is related to the return of http://anidb.net/ch895 [Dio Brando] - who is now simply referred to as DIO - after he was pulled up from the ocean in a casket, but not before he possessed http://anidb.net/ch2068 [Jonathan Joestar`s] dead body, which has a star-shaped birthmark around its neck and left shoulder, something both Joseph and Joutarou has as well.
Joutarou, Joseph and Avdol now starts their crusade towards Egypt, where DIO resides, in order to defeat and vanquish him once and for all, using the power of their Stands.
— written by Mortsyn

REGULAR.description:
Year 1987: Japan. A young man who is a descendant of the Joestar clan, Jotaro Kujo, is being held in a cell. He tells his mother, Holly, that he is being possessed by an evil spirit, so she asks her father, Joseph Joestar for help. Joseph immediately goes to Japan along with his friend, Avdol and go to Jotaro, explaining that he knows everything about the evil spirit. His explanation brings their ominous family history to light...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Man Possessed by an Evil Spirit
悪霊にとりつかれた男

REGULAR.description:
Jotaro finds out that the "evil spirit" he has is actually called a Stand, and tries to hide its existence as he tries to live a normal life. However, on the way to school one day, he sustains a very odd injury and meets a new transfer student named Noriaki Kakyoin.
Source: crunchyroll

With his evolved Stand powers, Jotaro is able to defeat Kakyoin, an assassin sent by DIO. He takes the wounded Kakyoin back to his house, hoping to get some information about DIO from him and Joseph notices a flesh bud on his head. A flesh bud is something that DIO uses to control his followers.
Source: crunchyroll

If they do not defeat DIO within 50 days, Holly could die... Jotaro and crew head to Egypt, where they think DIO is hiding. While on the plane, they run into another one of DIO`s assassins.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 灰の塔[タワー・オブ・グレー]

REGULAR.description:
DIO`s next assassin, Polnareff attacks Jotaro and crew. Despite the terrifyingly fast sword handling of Polnareff`s Stand, Silver Chariot, Avdol faces him with his Magician`s Red.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 銀の戦車[シルバーチャリオッツ]

REGULAR.description:
With a new person in their party, they head to Singapore with the boat the Speedwagon Foundation provided them. During their journey, a stoaway is found and causes a commotion and then Jotaro is targeted by an enemy Stand from within the water.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 暗青の月[ダークブルームーン]

REGULAR.description:
They manage to escape the boat that was destroyed by the fake captain and drift on an emergency boat. A giant ship shows itself in front of them and they go on board. Once they are on board, they realize they can`t seem to find a crew or anyone on board at all... just a cage with an orangutan in it.
Source: crunchyroll

Jotaro and crew get to Singapore and once they get to their hotel, they seperate. However, Soul Sacrifice was waiting for Polnareff in his room. Polnareff falls for the trap that Soul Sacrifice`s Stand, Ebony Devil, had set for him. Does Polnareff have a chance of defeating an enemy he can`t see?
Source: crunchyroll

Joseph uses Hermit Purple to create a message using the TV, which tells them that Kakyoin is a traitor. Meanwhile, Jotaro knows nothing about this and is out and about in Singapore with Anne and Kakyoin.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 黄の節制[イエローテンパランス]

REGULAR.description:
Jotaro and the others safely leave Singapore and enter India. Despite being rather surprised at the difference in culture, they stop in at a restaurant. There, Polnareff is attacked by a mysterious Stand that is inside a mirror.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Emperor and The Hanged Man, Part 1
皇帝[エンペラー]と吊られた男[ハングドマン] その1

REGULAR.description:
While trying to save Polnareff, Avdol is struck down by the enemy`s attack. After witnessing this, Polnareff is unable to keep his cool and is in a state of shock. That is when Centerfold`s Stand, Hanged Man starts its full on attack.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Emperor and The Hanged Man, Part 2
皇帝[エンペラー]と吊られた男[ハングドマン] その2

REGULAR.description:
Jotaro and the others next head toward Varanasi. On their way there, Joseph realizes his arm is quite swollen. At first, it didn`t bug him much, but as it got bigger, the creepier it started looking.
Source: crunchyroll

Jotaro and the others head toward Pakistan in a car. Polnareff is driving the car on a very dangerous mountain road, and recklessly passes a slow moving vehicle that was in front of him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 運命の車輪[ホウィール・オブ・フォーチュン]

REGULAR.description:
Jotaro and the others successfully survive another attack from the enemy Stand users and make it into Pakistan. However, they decide to find an inn at a nearby village because of the dense fog they suddenly hit. The village they get to is rather quiet and all of the inhabitants seem rather odd.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 正義[ジャスティス] その1

REGULAR.description:
Polnareff finally realizes that Enyaba is another assassin from DIO. He tries to warn the others, but Enyaba`s Stand, Justice, has the ability to take control of people`s bodies and corpses, and he is pursued. The whole village had already been under Enyaba`s control.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 正義[ジャスティス] その2

REGULAR.description:
After surviving Enyaba`s attack, Jotaro and crew make it to Pakistan`s capital, Karachi. There, they encounter DIO`s next assassin, Dan of Steel. Following DIO`s orders, Dan of Steel ruthlessly kills Enyaba in front of them. Jotaro and the others can`t help but feel conflicted about that happening, and end up in a battle with Dan of Steel.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 恋人[ラバーズ] その1

REGULAR.description:
Dan of Steel`s Stand, The Lovers, has entered Joseph`s brain. Dan puts himself at an advantage, with having Joseph`s life on the line, and tells Jotaro to do various things for him, knowing Jotaro has no choice but to obey. Meanwhile, Kakyoin and Polnareff also enter Joseph`s brain with their Stands and find the Stand that is using brain cells as food.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 恋人[ラバーズ] その2

REGULAR.description:
Jotaro and the others continue their journey through the desert, trying to get to Cairo. They travel with camels and can`t shake the feeling that someone is following them, but no one is in sight. Traveling in the killer heat, they realize that it`s still bright out at 8pm and the sun is actually rising rather than setting.
Source: crunchyroll

Kakyoin is dreaming and dreams about being in a strange amusement park, where he encounters the Death tarot card. While in the dream, he witnesses Death cut down a dog. Kakyoin wakes up screaming, but can`t remember what his bad dream was about.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 死神13[デスサーティーン] その1

REGULAR.description:
Kakyoin tries to convince the others that the baby is suspicious, but that backfires, and his friends start to doubt his sanity. Kakyoin then tries to convince them that he`s not crazy, and shows them his arm that has "Baby Stand" carved into it... but that just makes them believe he really is crazy. Kakyoin then tries to use his Stand to attack, but is knocked out by Polnareff. Eventually, Jotaro and the others wake up in the nightmare and the truth finally comes out.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 死神13[デスサーティーン] その2

REGULAR.description:
Jotaro and the others visit an island on the Red Sea to visit someone. When they got to the island, they meet someone that looks just like Avdol, but with white hair... It was his father! However, it appears that he doesn`t want to speak to Jotaro and the others, and retreats into his house. Polnareff goes to the beach, reflecting on the sadness of the fact that Avdol died protecting him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 審判[ジャッジメント] その1

REGULAR.description:
Polnareff revives his sister using one of the wishes he received, but then is attacked by her. The enemy stand user, Cameo says he`ll grant his other wish, and revives Avdol. The revived Shelly and Avdol then try to eat Polnareff alive. Polnareff tries to fight back with his Stand, but starts to lose consciousness and then...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 審判[ジャッジメント] その2

REGULAR.description:
Jotaro and the others obtain a submarine as a new means of travel. Through the Red Sea, they try to head toward Egypt where DIO awaits. Using the sonar to detect any threats on the outside, the submarine quietly dives in. They however realize that if they`re attacked underwater, there is nowhere to escape, so they are on their guard. Finally, when they are about to surface, a coffee mug that was in the cabin transforms and cuts off Joseph`s artificial hand.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 女教皇[ハイプリエステス] その1

REGULAR.description:
Jotaro and the others try to escape from the submarine, as it is now sinking from an attack from the enemy Stand, High Priestess. As the group puts on scuba gear and heads out into the water, the enemy Stand attacks again. The enemy keeps changing shape, but somehow, Jotaro and crew manage to escape. They find two underwater tunnels and realize that they`re close to the surface and start to relax when...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 女教皇[ハイプリエステス] その2

WIKIPEDIA_JP: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険

titles.title: JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken: Stardust Crusaders
JOJO 的奇妙冒險 星塵鬥士
JoJo的奇妙冒险 星尘斗士
ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 スターダストクルセイダース
Aventurile Bizare ale lui JoJo Partea 3: Vitejii Stelelor
Невероятните приключения на Джо-Джо и звездните кръстоносци
ההרפתקה המוזרה של ג`וג`ו: צלבני אבק הכוכבים
